tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE SocialMediaEngagementMetrics (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    post_id INT NOT NULL,
    engagement_level INT NOT NULL,
    likes INT NOT NULL,
    comments INT NOT NULL,
    shares INT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE engagement_metrics (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    platform VARCHAR(255),
    post_id INT,
    likes INT,
    comments INT,
    shares INT
);

CREATE TABLE marketing_strategies (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    platform VARCHAR(255),
    strategy_description TEXT,
    target_audience VARCHAR(255),
    engagement_goal INT
);

CREATE TABLE audience_demographics (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    platform VARCHAR(255),
    age_group VARCHAR(255),
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    location VARCHAR(255),
    interests TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE engagements (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    post_id INT,
    likes INT,
    comments INT,
    shares INT
);

CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    followers INT,
    following INT
);

CREATE TABLE campaigns (
    campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    campaign_name VARCHAR(100),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE social_media_accounts (
  account_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  account_name VARCHAR(50),
  followers_count INT,
  engagement_rate FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE posts (
  post_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  account_id INT,
  post_content TEXT,
  post_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE likes (
  like_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  post_id INT,
  account_id INT,
  like_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE comments (
  comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  post_id INT,
  account_id INT,
  comment_text TEXT,
  comment_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE hashtags (
  hashtag_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  hashtag_text VARCHAR(50)
)
